thread.title: Martha Stewart, Snoop Dogg finish each other’s sentences in delightful Super Bowl commercial | For The Win
thread.title_full: Martha Stewart, Snoop Dogg finish each other’s sentences in delightful Super Bowl commercial | For The Win

author: Nina Mandell
title: Martha Stewart, Snoop Dogg finish each other’s sentences in delightful Super Bowl commercial | For The Win
text:
Follow @ninamandell 
Snoop Dogg and Martha Stewart are two delightful people who have a surprising friendship that makes us really happy and in their latest friendship adventures star in a T-Mobile commercial. It’s one of three ads that the company will air during the Super Bowl (which according to T-Mobile ties them with Budweiser for air time at the Super Bowl, which you should probably keep in mind if your rates go up because that’s a lot of ad buys.) 
In the ad, Stewart tries to finish Snoop Dogg’s sentences and fails miserably until they both agree that smartphone sweaters, which keep a smartphone “all cozy” are “all that”. 
For more and to vote on your favorite Super Bowl commercial, head over to Ad Meter. More Martha Stewart!
